CriticalErrorHandler Class Reference

This class serves as base class for classes that want to handle critical messages in different ways, and also keeps track of the current critical message handler through its static methods. More...

#include <debug.hpp>

static CriticalErrorHandler * set (CriticalErrorHandler *)

Detailed Description

This class serves as base class for classes that want to handle critical messages in different ways, and also keeps track of the current critical message handler through its static methods.
